form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: NOTICE OF A FINAL HEARING CEREMONY

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/21/2023 * mailed 4/16/99 OF SOUTH U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service 300 North Los Angeles Street Los Angeles, California 90012 Date: April 16, 1999 Alien Number: A 71 807 696 THIS IS NOT A FINAL HEARING CEREMONY NOTICE Dear Sir or Madam: In order to complete the processing of your application for citizenship, the following items or actions are needed prior to the issuance of your certificate at your upcoming Oath Ceremony. It is requested that you please come in person/or send in photographs to the Park Place Building located at 9650 Flair Drive, in the city of El Monte. You are scheduled to bring in/or mail photographs in by: Date: April 23, 1999 Time: 11:30 a.m. The following items or actions are requested: X Two identical 2x2 inch photos, unglazed, taken within the last 30 days. The distance from top of head to point of chin should be 1 1/4 inches. The picture must be on thin paper with light background, showing right view without hat. Photos may either be in natural color or black and white. Do not bring machine-made pictures or simple snapshots. X Your signature and alien number are required on your photographs. Please return this letter in the enclosed envelope to the following address: IMMIGRATION & NATURALIZATION SERVICE 9650 Flair Drive El Monte, California 91731 Attn: Citizenship, Fourth Floor
